name: Activate Trap
effect: Success: Until the end of the turn, adversaries are blocked.

name: Adal, Loyal Rebel
effect: Destroy Adal -- Ready an incapacitated Jaffa character. Destroy Adal -- Stop an incapacitated character.

name: Adrian Conrad, Dying Recluse
effect: When you play Adrian Conrad, you may block a character from the current mission. Each time you revive Adrian Conrad at a failed mission, you may take him into your hand.

name: Advancing Line
effect: Failure: Stop a team character. If a Jaffa adversary is assigned, incapacitate a team character instead.

name: Aegir, Asgard Commander
effect: When you play Aegir, if an adversary is assigned, the current mission gets difficulty -1.

name: Alar, Eurondan Leader
effect: "Alar gets skills -1 for each different trait (other than ""character,"" ""team,"" and ""support"") on all assigned characters."

name: Alec Colson, Billionaire Businessman
effect: Alec Colson is blocked during the first mission played each turn.

name: Alexi Vaselov, Decorated Colonel
effect: [O]: Each time your opponent assigns an adversary while Alexi Vaselov is assigned, you gain 1 power. [T]: Each time your opponent plays an obstacle while Alexi Vaselov is assigned, you gain 1 power.

name: Alien Foothold
effect: When you play this obstacle, stop a support character.

name: Alliance of System Lords
effect: To play this obstacle, stop an adversary unless no characters are assigned. Gain 2 power.

name: Altman, Equipment Specialist
effect: Altman gets skills +1 while another SGC character has at least one glyph matching one of his.

name: Amonet, Cherished Queen
effect: Each time you assign Amonet, your opponent may incapacitate a team character. If he doesn't, you may stop a character.

name: Anatole Konstantinov, Cosmonaut
effect: At the start of your debrief phase, you may look at one card from the top of your mission pile for each failed mission. If you do, place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

name: Ancient Contagion
effect: "Failure: Choose one: Destroy a support character; or incapacitate a team character."

name: Anise, Experimental Scientist
effect: While Anise is ready, she gets: "Stop a team character -- The current mission gets difficulty -1."

name: Annihilation
effect: To play this event, you must have an assigned character. Stop all assigned NID characters. Destroy all other assigned support characters, and all complications, obstacles, and assigned adversaries. Incapacitate all other assigned team characters.

name: Anubis, Powerful Nemesis
effect: While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, your Goa'uld and Jaffa adversaries get difficulty +1 and revive cost +2.

name: Apophis, Enemy of Sokar
effect: When you score Apophis, your opponent may destroy two support characters. If he doesn't, you may incapacitate a team character.

name: Apophis, The Serpent God
effect: At the end of your opponent's power phase, if this adversary card is in your villain score pile, you gain 1 power.

name: Approaching Swarm
effect: This obstacle counts as two Replicator cards.

name: Aron, Rebel Leader
effect: Each adversary gets revive cost +1 for each different glyph Aron has.

name: Avert Bombing
effect: When you play this mission, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready a character.

name: Ayiana, Remnant of Atlantis
effect: Stop Ayiana, pay 3 power -- Ready another character. Destroy Ayiana -- Ready another character.

name: Baal, Heir to Power
effect: When you score Baal, incapacitate a stopped team character.

name: Baal, Persistent Foe
effect: Each time you revive Baal, you may pay 4 power. If you do, score him.

name: Backstabbed
effect: Dominion. When you play this obstacle, if a Jaffa adversary is assigned, choose a support character. He is blocked.

name: Barber, SG-5 Lieutenant
effect: [G], Discard a hero card, pay 1 power -- Barber gets Culture +1 until the end of the current mission.

name: Battle Losses
effect: Failure: Your opponent destroys a support character.

name: Blackmailed
effect: Failure: Destroy a support character whose cost is equal to or less than the total number of Political cards.

name: Blocked Escape
effect: When you play this obstacle, choose a character for each other Replicator card at the current mission. Those characters are blocked.

name: Booby-Trapped Z.P.M.
effect: Dominion. Failure: If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, destroy a gear.

name: Boris, Submariner
effect: While Boris is assigned, he gets Ingenuity +1 for each assigned Russian character who has a glyph.

name: Borren, Aschen Official
effect: Failure: Stop a character.

name: Brainwashed Teal'c, Faithful First Prime
effect: Complications cost power -1 to play while Brainwashed Teal'c is assigned. When you score Brainwashed Teal'c, stop all SGC team and Jaffa team characters.

name: Brent Langham, Unscrupulous Scientist
effect: When you play Brent Langham, you may stop an NID team character. If you do, search your deck for a gear card, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. If you don't, you may take a gear card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Brian Vogler, Company Man
effect: Destroy Brian Vogler -- Destroy a support character. During your opponent's turn, Brian Vogler becomes an adversary that can't be assigned, revived, or scored.

name: Bricksdale, Area 51 Scientist
effect: Stop Bricksdale -- Ready a gear.

name: Build Naquadah Reactor
effect: Success: Gain 2 power.

name: Building the Ranks
effect: When you play this obstacle, gain 1 power for each other Replicator card at the current mission.

name: Buried Gate
effect: To assign a character, your opponent pays 1 power.

name: Cameron Mitchell, Inspiring Influence
effect: Each time you assign Cameron Mitchell, you may pay 3 power and discard a card. If you do, ready another character who has a glyph matching one of his.

name: Camulus, Celtic God of War
effect: Complications get difficulty +1 while Camulus is assigned.

name: Canopic Jar
effect: Stop an assigned adversary -- Place this gear on him. While this gear is on an adversary, he is blocked. When you fail a mission, destroy this gear.

name: Canvass Illegal Operations
effect: Success: You may take an event card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Carmichael, SGC Physician
effect: Each time another character would be incapacitated, you may stop Carmichael and pay 2 power. If you do, stop that character instead.

name: Carolyn Lam, Chief Medical Officer
effect: Each time a Science obstacle is played, you may pay 2 power. If you do, Carolyn Lam gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

name: Catalog Alien Technology
effect: Success: You may discard any number of cards, then refill your hand.

name: Caught Off Guard
effect: When you play this obstacle, destroy a gear.

name: Cave-In
effect: When you play this obstacle, your opponent loses 2 power.

name: Celebration
effect: Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If there was a successful mission this turn, he gets skills +2 until the end of the current mission instead.

name: Charlie, Re'tu Liaison
effect: Success: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

name: Chaska, Caledonian Minister
effect: Failure: Each team character gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

name: Chloe, Lab Assistant
effect: Choose a team character, discard a card -- Until the end of the turn, that team character gets Culture +1 and Science +1. You can do this only once each turn.

name: Clever Disguise
effect: You can play this event only if the current mission is an Ingenuity mission. Choose a character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If he is blocked, unblock him.

name: Construct Anti-Replicator Weapon
effect: Failure: Your opponent may take an obstacle card from his discard pile into hand.

name: Contact Giant Aliens
effect: Success: You may destroy an assigned support character. If you do, gain power equal to his cost.

name: Containment Field
effect: This obstacle costs power +1 to play for each assigned character. When you play this obstacle, ready all assigned characters. They are blocked.

name: Critical Wound
effect: When you play this obstacle, incapacitate a team character.

name: Cronus, God of Fate
effect: Each time you would pay Cronus' revive cost, you may destroy another adversary instead. If you do, revive and ready Cronus.

name: Cut Off
effect: When you play this obstacle, you may return a support character to his owner's hand.

name: Daniel Jackson, Ascended Being
effect: When you play Daniel Jackson, each assigned team character gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

name: Daniel Jackson, Veteran Traveler
effect: Each mission that has a glyph matching one of Daniel Jackson's gets difficulty -1 while he is ready or assigned.

name: Daria Voronkova, Military Aide
effect: Each time Daria Voronkova earns a glyph, you may ready another Russian character.

name: Deep Memory Scan
effect: Failure: Stop a team character.

name: Defeat Kull Warrior
effect: When you play this mission, you may pay 4 power. If you do, it becomes an Ingenuity mission until the end of the turn.

name: Defeat Replicators
effect: When you play this mission, you may pay 4 power. If you do, it becomes a Combat mission until the end of the turn.

name: Defend the Byrsa
effect: Each time you boost a character, he gets an additional skills +1.

name: Delek, Tok'ra Leader
effect: Stop Delek -- Gain 1 power.

name: Denya, Ori Dissenter
effect: When you play Denya, your opponent loses 1 power.

name: Destroy Ori Beachhead
effect: Failure: Your opponent may play an adversary at no cost.

name: Digging Deep
effect: Ready a character. At the end of the current mission, incapacitate him.

name: Dimensional Shift
effect: When you play this obstacle, choose a character. He is blocked, along with each other character who has a glyph matching one of his.

name: Disable the Link
effect: When you play this mission, you may pay 4 power. If you do, it becomes a Science mission until the end of the turn.

name: Elliot, Distinguished Lieutenant
effect: While Elliott is assigned to a mission that has a glyph none of your characters has, he gets skills +1 for each different glyph he has.

name: Elude Patrols
effect: The villain player performs the first action at this mission.

name: Enduring Evil
effect: When you play this obstacle, take an adversary card from your villain score pile into hand.

name: Energy Feedback
effect: "Failure: Choose one: Destroy a gear; or stop a character."

name: Entranced
effect: Dominion. Failure: If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, you may move a glyph from one team character to another.

name: Entrap Goa'uld
effect: Each time your opponent assigns an adversary, plays an obstacle, or plays a complication, you discard a random card.

name: Entropic Cascade Failure
effect: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Play a revealed support character card at no cost, then discard the other cards. At the end of the turn, destroy that character.

name: Epidemic
effect: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each other Disease obstacle. Failure: You may take this obstacle into your hand.

name: Erebus Commander, Death Camp Commandant
effect: Erebus Commander gets difficulty +1 for each obstacle that has dominion.

name: Escape Bounty Hunter
effect: This mission gets difficulty -1 for each failed mission.

name: Escape Naquadah Mine
effect: When you play this mission, you may ready a character. If you do, that character is blocked.

name: Escape Prison World
effect: Combat obstacles get difficulty +1.

name: Estrangement
effect: Failure: Return a support character to his owner's hand.

name: Excavate Ancient Artifacts
effect: Success: You may search your deck for an Ancient card. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Explore Anubis' Hybrid Lab
effect: Failure: Your opponent may search his deck for an adversary card. If he does, he reveals it, takes it into hand, and shuffles his deck.

name: Expose Fraud
effect: Failure: Your opponent destroys a support character and gains power equal to his cost.

name: False Memory
effect: Failure: Look at the top card of your opponent's mission pile. Place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

name: Fearing a Return
effect: Dominion. Failure: You may take a Goa'uld obstacle card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Finishing Blow
effect: Destroy a stopped adversary.

name: Forced to Surrender
effect: Failure: Incapacitate a team character. Unless a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, your opponent may prevent this by stopping a ready team character instead.

name: Framed for Murder
effect: Failure: Destroy a support character and stop a team character.

name: Free Captives
effect: Failure: Destroy all assigned support characters.

name: Full Contingent
effect: This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each other Jaffa obstacle and for each assigned Jaffa adversary.

name: G.D.O.
effect: Stop this gear, pay 3 power -- Unblock a character. Stop and destroy this gear, pay 3 power -- Return an obstacle to its owner's hand.

name: Galactic Threat
effect: This obstacle costs power +1 to play for each assigned character.

name: Garan, Servant of Arkhan
effect: Garan gets Culture +2 if there was a failed mission this turn. Garan gets Ingenuity +2 if there was a successful mission this turn.

name: Gather Intelligence
effect: Success: You may search your deck for an event card. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Glider Cannon
effect: Stop this gear, pay 2 power, stop a team character or Jaffa support character -- Discard the top card of your deck. If it's a hero card, destroy an adversary.

name: Glider Strafing Run
effect: Failure: Destroy a support character (or two support characters, if a Jaffa adversary is assigned).

name: Goa'uld Experiments
effect: Stop this gear, destroy a support character -- Each NID team character who has a glyph gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

name: Golon Jarlath, Reluctant Ally
effect: Failure: Each team character gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

name: Gone Fishing
effect: Discard any number of hero cards. Then search your deck for a hero card with a cost equal to or less than the number of cards you discarded. Reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Graham Simmons, Assistant Engineer
effect: Graham Simmons costs power -1 to play for each ready gear.

name: Grogan, Unseasoned Sergeant
effect: For each different glyph Grogan has, he gets skills +1 and point value -1.

name: Guest Lecture
effect: You can play this event only if the current mission is a Science mission. Choose a character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If he has no glyphs, you may move a glyph from another character to him.

name: Harper, SG-5 Commander
effect: [L], Discard a hero card, pay 1 power -- Harper gets Science +1 until the end of the current mission.

name: Hathor, Rising Power
effect: Each time you revive Hathor, place the top card of your deck face down beneath her. When you score Hathor, for each card beneath her, destroy a gear or support character.

name: Hazardous Duty
effect: When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character. Success: If the chosen character earns the current mission's glyph, incapacitate him.

name: Head Injury
effect: When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character. Your opponent may stop him. Success or Failure: If the chosen character is assigned, incapacitate him.

name: Helping Hand
effect: Destroy an obstacle that is neither Goa'uld nor Jaffa. Then you may stop an Asgard character. If you do, gain 2 power.

name: Herak, First Prime of Anubis
effect: Each time you assign Herak, you may destroy an assigned support character.

name: Hold Off Ambush
effect: When you play this mission, your opponent gains 2 power.

name: Horus Guard
effect: Dominion. Failure: If a Jaffa adversary is assigned, stop a character.

name: Hunt Goa'uld
effect: Success: Choose a card in your opponent's villain score pile. He discards it.

name: ID Scanner
effect: Each time you play a support character, you may stop this gear. If you do, stop that character and gain 1 power.

name: Important Dig
effect: Stop up to two characters who each have 2 Culture or more. For each character you stop, take a gear card from your discard pile into hand.

name: In-Fighting
effect: When you play this obstacle, you may move a glyph from one team character to another.

name: Inform New President
effect: This mission gets difficulty -1 for each obstacle at the current mission.

name: Intercept Osiris
effect: Failure: Assigned adversaries get revive cost -2.

name: Interrogation
effect: Stop up to two characters who each have 2 Ingenuity or more. For each character you stop, take a villain card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Intimidation
effect: To play this event, choose an assigned NID team character and discard a support character card. Until the end of the current mission, that team character gains the skills of the discarded card.

name: Invasion Reconnaissance
effect: Success: Obstacles cost power +1 to play until the end of the turn.

name: Investigate Ancient Inscriptions
effect: When you play this mission, choose a team character to get skills +2 until the end of the turn. At the start of your debrief phase, incapacitate him.

name: Investigate Dead Hosts
effect: When a character earns a glyph from this mission, incapacitate him.

name: Investigate Mass Murder
effect: When you play this mission, destroy a support character.

name: Jack O'Neill, Optimist
effect: [L]: Each other character who has a [L] glyph gets skills +1. [S]: Each other character who has a [S] glyph gets skills +1

name: Jack O'Neill, SGC Commander
effect: Each time an SGC character earns a glyph, if Jack O'Neill is ready, you may stop him. If you do, the next mission this turn gets difficulty -2.

name: Jarrod Kane, Rand Senator
effect: While an adversary is assigned, Jarrod Kane gets Science +1 and Combat +1.

name: Jay Felger, Scientist in the Field
effect: Pay 1 power -- Move a glyph from Jay Felger to another character.

name: Jennifer Hailey, Brilliant Cadet
effect: [G] or [S]: Each hero card's success text occurs an additional time while Jennifer Hailey is assigned.

name: Jennings, Agent of the Trust
effect: [L]: Each time you assign Jennings, adversaries can't be revived until the end of the current mission. Success or Failure: If Jennings doesn't have a [P] glyph, destroy all assigned support characters.

name: Joint Mission
effect: When you play this obstacle, choose a ready team character who isn't blocked. Success or Failure: If the chosen character isn't assigned, incapacitate him.

name: Judgment of the Taldur
effect: Failure: Your opponent can't play any more missions this turn.

name: Ka'lel, High Council Member
effect: Ka'lel gets Culture +1 if there was a successful Combat mission this turn. Ka'lel gets Combat +1 if there was a successfu Culture mission this turn.

name: Kasuf, Leader of Abydos
effect: Success: Destroy an adversary.

name: Kearney, Air Force Major
effect: When you play Kearney, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready a gear.

name: Kelmaa, Tok'ra Doctor
effect: [S]: Each time Kelmaa would become incapacitated, you may pay 2 power. If you do, stop her instead. [T], Stop and incapacitate Kelmaa -- Stop an incapacitated character.

name: Kelnorim
effect: To play this event, block a ready Jaffa character from the current mission. That character gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

name: Kendrick, Special Investigator
effect: At the end of your opponent's power phase, you may destroy Kendrick. If you do, your opponent shuffles his mission pile.

name: Kershaw, NID Operative
effect: Each time you play a mission that has a glyph matching one of Kershaw's, your opponent loses 1 power.

name: Khalek, Son of Anubis
effect: Each time you assign Khalek, place a random card from your opponent's hand face up beneath him. For each hero card beneath Khalek, he gets difficulty +1 and revive cost +1.

name: Kheb Monk, Adherent of Desala
effect: Destroy Kheb Monk, pay 2 power -- Unblock a character.

name: Kneel Before Your God
effect: When you play this obstacle, if a Goa'uld or Jaffa adversary is assigned, you gain 2 power. When you play this obstacle, if a Jaffa character is assigned, your opponent gains 2 power.

name: Kor Mak Joining
effect: Failure: You may move a glyph from one team character to another. If you do, stop both of those characters.

name: Kull Warrior, Super Soldier
effect: Each time Kull Warrior would be destroyed, you may pay its revive cost to prevent that.

name: Kvasir, Advanced Engineer
effect: [S]: Kvasir gets Culture +1. [G]: Kvasir gets Ingenuity +1. [P]: Kvasir gets Ingenuity +1.

effect: Stop up to two characters who each have 2 Combat or more. For each character you stop, stop an adversary

effect: Each time Lindsay earns a different glyph, you may pay 3 power and discard a card. If you do, ready her.

name: Loyal Subjects
effect: "To play this obstacle, discard either: two cards; or one obstacle that has dominion. Gain 1 power."

name: Lucy! I'm Home!
effect: To play this event, block a ready team character from the current mission. Ready an SGC character.

name: Luthor, Informant
effect: When you play Luthor, unblock a character.

name: M'zel, Influential Leader
effect: [T]: Jaffa support characters cost power -1 to play. [G] and [O]: Jaffa hero cards cost power -1 to play.

name: M9 Pistol
effect: Stop this gear, block a team character from the current mission -- Complications cost power +1 to play until the end of the current mission.

name: Mala, Ishta's Kin'dra
effect: Each time Mala earns a [G] glyph, you may search your deck for a Jaffa character card. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Mansfield, SG-17 Commander
effect: [L] or [P]: Mansfield gets skills +1 for each successful mission this turn.

name: Marell, Research Scientist
effect: Each time you assign Marell, you may destroy an obstacle. If you do, destroy Marell at the end of the current mission.

name: Martial Arts Training
effect: You can play this event only if the current mission is a Combat mission. Choose a character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If he has no glyphs, you may move a glyph from another character to him.

name: Maz'rai, High Council Member
effect: Destroy Maz'rai -- Gain 1 power (or 2 power, if at least one Jaffa character is assigned).

name: Memory Stamp
effect: When you play this obstacle, you may move a glyph from one team character to another.

name: Mimic Device

name: Mind Invasion
effect: Failure: For each other Replicator card at the current mission, incapacitate a team character.

name: Mr. Kent, Leader of the Trust
effect: Mr. Kent gets Combat +1 for each NID character who has a glyph.

name: Natania, Simple Villager
effect: Natania gets Culture +1 if there was a successful mission this turn. Natania gets Combat +1 if there was a failed mission this turn.

name: Near-Death Experience
effect: Failure: You may choose to have your opponent shuffle his mission pile.

name: Nerus, Agent of the Ori
effect: Each time your opponent is about to play a mission, you may stop Nerus and pay 3 power. If you do, look at the top card of your opponent's mission pile, then place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

name: New Guy!
effect: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. For each glyph he has, each team character who has no glyph gets skills -1.

name: Occupation Force
effect: While a Jaffa adversary is assigned, this obstacle gets dominion.

effect: Each time you assign Olokun, you may choose a team character and pay power equal to the number of glyphs he has. If you do, he is blocked from the current mission.

effect: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each failed mission this turn.

effect: Each time Orlin becomes stopped, place the top card of your deck face down beneath him. Orlin gets skills -1 for each card beneath him.

effect: When you play Osiris, stop a support character. Each time you revive Osiris, your opponent stops a support character.

effect: [O]: Reynolds gets skills +1 for each other stopped SGC team character who has a glyph.

name: Ribbon Device Torture
effect: Failure: Your opponent discards two random cards. If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, you may instead look at your opponent's hand. If you do, choose a card from it for him to discard.

name: Rigged Explosives
effect: When you play this obstacle, your opponent destroys a support character.

name: Risk of Exposure
effect: When you play this obstacle, gain 1 power for each glyph on each assigned character.

name: Robert Kinsey, Vice President
effect: At the end of your power phase, if this adversary card is in your villain score pile, you gain 1 power.

name: Ruslan Chernovshev, Opportunist
effect: Ruslan Chernovshev gets Science +1 while an NID character is assigned. Ruslan Chernovshev gets Ingenuity +1 while another Russian character is assigned.

name: Sabotage Goa'uld Alliance
effect: Each time your opponent assigns an adversary or plays an obstacle, you lose 1 power.

name: Sagan Institute Box
effect: You get 1 experience while at least one support character has a glyph. Destroy this gear -- Take a support character card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Samantha Carter, Jolinar of Malkshur
effect: [P], Stop and incapacitate Samantha Carter -- Turn an assigned adversary face down.

name: Samantha Carter, Mathematics Wizard
effect: [G], Stop Samantha Carter, pay 2 power -- Return an obstacle at the current mission to its owner's hand.

name: Sanderson, Rogue Operative
effect: Each time you play another NID card, Sanderson gets Combat +1 until the end of the turn. Each time you play a gear, Sanderson gets Ingenuity +1 until the end of the turn.

name: Scenarios of the Keeper
effect: Failure: Look at the top five cards of your opponent's deck. You may place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

name: Security Field
effect: This obstacle costs power +1 to play for each assigned character.

name: Seevis, Resistance Leader
effect: Success: You may ready a team character.

name: Sekhmet, Genetic Experiment
effect: Sekhmet costs power -2 to play while no characters are assigned. To assign Sekhmet, pay 1 power for each assigned character.

name: Self Sacrifice
effect: Make an assigned support character +1 skills until the end of the current mission. At the end of the current mission, destroy him.

name: SGC Emblem
effect: Your SGC characters get skills +1 for each successful mission this turn.

name: Shau'nac, Of the Red Hills
effect: Destroy Shau'nac -- Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the turn.

name: Shawn Grieves, Team Leader
effect: [O] or [S], Destroy a support character, pay 2 power -- Ready an NID character.

name: Siler, Gate Room Technician
effect: Each time another support character would be stopped, you may stop Siler and ready that character instead.

name: Sina, Tactician
effect: Each time you place a Tok'ra event in your discard pile, you may stop Sina. If you do, take that event into hand.

name: Sindar, Loyal Servant of Cronus
effect: "While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, each of your opponent's missions gets: ""Failure: Your opponent may take a Jaffa adversary or Jaffa obstacle card from his discard pile into hand."""

name: Skaara, Hero of Abydos
effect: "While Skaara is assigned, he gets: ""Stop Skaara -- Ready another character."""

name: Smith, NID Operator
effect: Each time you play a gear, you may stop Smith. If you do, gain 1 power for each different glyph Smith has.

name: Smoke Grenades
effect: Stop this gear -- If the current mission is an Ingenuity mission, it gets difficulty -1. Destroy this gear -- Return a complication to its owner's hand.

name: Sodan Cloaking Device
effect: Stop this gear -- If the current mission is a Combat mission, it gets difficulty -1. Destroy this gear -- Return a support character to his owner's hand.

name: Spreading Fear
effect: Dominion. This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Jaffa adversary is assigned.

name: Standoff
effect: When you play this obstacle, gain 1 power for each glyph on each assigned character.

name: Steven Rayner, Archaeologist
effect: Steven Rayner costs power -2 to play while none of your characters has a glyph.

name: Stoicism
effect: Ready a character who has a glyph, and each other Russian character who has a glyph matching one that character has.

name: Stop Experiments
effect: obstacles cost power -1 to play.

name: Stop Prim'tah
effect: While an adversary is assigned, to assign a character, you must pay power +1.

name: Strained Relations
effect: Failure: Gain 2 power.

name: Strange Bedfellows
effect: To play this event, choose two glyphs on two different characters. Move each of those glyphs to the other character.

name: Sudden Onset
effect: When you play this obstacle, you may take a Disease obstacle card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Suicidal Za'tarc
effect: When you play this obstacle, choose a ready support character. Success or Failure: If the chosen character is assigned, destroy him.

name: Sway Villagers
effect: This mission gets difficulty +2 for each adversary card in your opponent's villain score pile.

name: T'akaya, Salish Spirit
effect: When you play a Combat mission, destroy T'akaya. Destroy T'akaya, pay X power -- Place an adversary that costs X on the bottom of his owner's deck.

name: Taken in Secret
effect: Failure: Destroy a support character (or two support characters, if a Goa'uld adversary is assigned).

name: Tara'c, Zealous Warrior
effect: Stop and destroy Tara'c -- Your opponent loses 1 power.

name: Targeted Abduction
effect: When you play this obstacle, stop an assigned character whose skill being contributed to the current mission is equal to or less than the number of other Replicator cards there.

name: Teal'c, Fierce Warrior
effect: [P]: Teal'c gets skills +1 while an adversary is assigned. [T]: Teal'c gets skills +1 while an adversary is assigned

name: Teamwork
effect: This event costs power -1 to play for each assigned SGC character. Choose a team character to get skills +2 until the end of the current mission.

name: Terminal Condition
effect: Failure: Destroy a support character.

name: Test of Worthiness
effect: Failure: Stop all characters.

name: The Keeper, Guardian
effect: Failure: Look at the top five cards of your opponent's deck. You may place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

name: Third, Human-Form Replicator
effect: Third gets revive cost -1 for each other Replicator card at the current mission.

name: Thoth, Servant of Anubis
effect: Failure: You may take an adversary card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Til'Vak, Servant of Baal
effect: Each time you assign Til'Vak, you may choose a support character. He is blocked from the current mission. Failure: Destroy the chosen character.

name: Time Dilation
effect: Failure: Your opponent skips his next turn.

name: Tok'ra Ambush
effect: Ready a Tok'ra support character.

name: Tok'ra Operative Network
effect: Obstacles cost power -1 to play. Stop this gear and a Tok'ra support character -- Turn an obstacle at the current mission face down.

name: Tolinev, Russian Lieutenant
effect: Tolinev gets experience +1 for each other Russian character who has a glyph matching one of hers.

name: Tollan Health Monitor
effect: Stop this gear, pay 2 power -- Stop an incapacitated character.

name: Touchstone
effect: At the start of your debrief phase, you may look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the amount of power you have remaining. Place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

name: Translate Cartouche
effect: This mission gets difficulty +1 for each assigned character who doesn't have a glyph.

name: Turn the Tables
effect: Stop a ready adversary.

name: Turncoat
effect: Failure: Look at the top card of your opponent's mission pile. Place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

name: Tyler, Reole Fugitive
effect: "Pay 1 power, discard a card -- Choose another character. ""Tyler"" gets all that character's traits until the end of the current mission."

name: Unas Attack
effect: When you play this obstacle, your opponent destroys a support character.

name: Unbelievers
effect: Failure: Destroy any number of support characters whose total cost equals 5 or less.

name: Unfamiliar Customs
effect: Each time your opponent plays a support character, that character is blocked until the end of the current mission.

name: Unforeseen Consequences
effect: Failure: Gain 2 power.

name: Vala Mal Doran, Resourceful Rogue
effect: [G], Pay 2 power, block another team character -- Ready Vala Mal Doran.

name: Vallarin, Russian Major
effect: [L]: Vallarin gets skills +1 for each failed mission.

name: Victory or Death
effect: To play this event, destroy an assigned Jaffa support character. Destroy an assigned adversary.

name: Walkie-Talkie
effect: "Stop this gear and a character -- Choose another character who shares a trait with the stopped character (other than ""character,"" ""team,"" or ""support""). The chosen character gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission."

name: Xe'ls, Salish Spirit
effect: When you play a Combat mission, destroy Xe'ls. Each time a gear or another support character would be destroyed, you may stop Xe'ls instead.

name: Yat'Yir, Gerak's Aide
effect: If another Jaffa card has been played this turn, Yat'Yir gets skills +1. While a Jaffa adversary is assigned, Yat'Yir gets skills +1.

name: Young Jack, Loki's Clone
effect: While an SGC team character is assigned, Young Jack gets Science +1, Combat +1, and Ingenuity +1. While Jack O'Neill is assigned, Young Jack gets Ingenuity +1,

name: Yu, Venerable Lord
effect: Pay 1 power -- Yu gets revive cost -2 until the end of the current mission.

name: Yuri, Submariner
effect: Each time an obstacle is played while Yuri is assigned with another Russian character, you may destroy him. If you do, destroy that obstacle.

name: Zarin, Goa'uld Impostor
effect: "While Zarin is assigned, she gets: ""Stop Zarin -- Stop a ready adversary."""

name: Zipacna, Cunning Servant
effect: Stop Zipacna, pay 3 power -- Choose a Goa'uld obstacle to get dominion.
